author: A_Brickset_user
title: awsome!!
review:
this set maybe the best 2004 set out yet! (including nidhiki
and krekka.) legos storyline is not as god as it was, but the sets just keep getting better! i own this set and it is sweet.
    
   goodies:
    new peices
    twice the playibility with spider mode
    cool head and includes disk
   
   badies:
    gets a little floppy after a while
     nothing else!
     i rate this set a 10/10. i love it!

author: A_Brickset_user
title: BEST VAHKI!
review:
I got this set since yesterday and I love him!

PROS:
-new parts good for MOCS(example:new metru-colored matoran torso and olda arms!)
-awesome vahki blades
-he's a TRANSFORMER(bipedal to spider!)
-new Kanoka lanuncher/mouth
CONS:
no cons in this set,I'm ottimist!

I reccomend this set to every BIONICLE fan

author: reidak49
title: great!
review: good color scheme the kanoka dish launcher for a mouth and a red piece its arms can move back and fourth poseable and these could turn into a bipeadel spider and last late shiping in target had a golden vahi mask of time but the vahi are sold out

author: Gus_263
title: Green vahki enforcer
review: This vahki, enforcer of le-metru, have notable features, being they a  disk launcher in the mouth, a glow in the dark disk, the great weapons with claws in the front, awesome colors, with red eyes, gear systems, cool moves and  some playability. The set can shift to bipedis in quadrupedis.

author: krysto2002
title: This is bohrok all over again...

author: rahaga369
title: Dude!
review: For those of you who don't know about my password incident, check out my profile. Anyways, thumbs up for this guy! I love the design. The arms however, I love the most. And by the way, if you're wondering what happened to the Metus I used to own, I gave it to my brother (a.k.a. vezon8764).

author: Carl
title: Dude Vahki!
review:
No, this is not rahaga369 ( AKA: barraki2046 ) as my title may suggest. This is good old Kiwi Carl reviewing another brilliant Bionicle.

Pros:
Nice head
Cool shooting action
Snippy weapons
Spinny
New legs
Green

Cons:
NONE!

As some people already said, all the Vahki have the same design but I have to say I don't mind that. As long as its a good design then it's OK having six the same. This is yet another fantastic set and is a must have for everyone.

author: KLOKRIECHER
title: LEGO BIONICLE (Vahki) - Vorzakh Review
review:
This is a cool figure to have and it's fun to play with as well.

Box/Instructions

The instruction has 28 pages and there're no mistakes in it.

Parts

This set has a lot of cool pieces which you can use for future MOC's and/or brickfilms for sure. I really love the weapons for this figure and we also get a disc which glows in the dark.

The build

The build is very fun and easy and we also don't need to worry about stickers as well.

The completed model

[img]http://www.klokriecher.de/gallery_pics/l/8616-1.jpg[/img]


The arms, the hands, the legs, the feet and the head can be adjusted. If you push the mouth of this vahki you'll be able to shoot the disc and if you sviwel the torso you can put this figure in a crawling position which looks very nice, too. I also like the design of this vahki.

Summary

All in all this set is an great set and I would recommend you to get this. You can find this set on eBay, BrickLink and Amazon for sure. Here is the link where you can check out the full gallery I made for this set on my website: http://www.klokriecher.de
